# The `DefinitionAndSourceRegister` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Simple struct used to hold a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> value and the instruction which defines it. <a href="#details">More...</a>

Simple struct used to hold a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> value and the instruction which defines it.
